improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero error.  The variable x will be 0 after the loop, leading to a runtime error when calculating y = 1/x. Add a check to ensure x is not 0 before division.
Unreachable code: The loop continues until x becomes 0. The y = (1/x) calculation will result in a ZeroDivisionError and is unreachable.
The loop iterates 10 times, decrementing x each time. The final value of x will be 0. The division by zero could be prevented by adjusting the loop or the calculation.
